name: nextjs-serverless-demo
description: Simple Next.js on Lambda via Serverless demo
author: Ryan Roemer <ryan.roemer@formidable.com>

scripts.env: echo export STAGE=${STAGE:-localdev}; echo export SERVICE_NAME=nextjs-serverless; echo export AWS_REGION=${AWS_REGION:-us-east-1}; echo export AWS_XRAY_CONTEXT_MISSING=LOG_ERROR
